verbs.description: < p > President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: have] signed a joint document in which they commit to working “ toward complete denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.”

< p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] have [V: signed] [ARG1: a joint document in which they commit to working “ toward complete denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.”

< p > President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un have signed [ARGM-LOC: a joint document] [R-ARGM-LOC: in which] [ARG0: they] [V: commit] [ARG2: to working “ toward complete denuclearization of the Korean] Peninsula.”

< p > President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un have signed a joint document in which [ARG0: they] commit to [V: working] “ [ARG1: toward complete denuclearization of the Korean] Peninsula.”
